user_query: My friend wants to lose weight and is looking for food items that are low in calories. Can you provide a list of food items along with their calorie content? Additionally, can you suggest some activities that can help burn calories?

TaskList.description: Gather a list of low-calorie food items along with their calorie content.
Compile a list of activities that can help burn calories.
Combine the results from subtasks 1 and 2 into a comprehensive list for the user.
